about_the_game:
Heart of Stone

The Prince's "Heart of Stone" cosmetics DLC includes a Cicada Coin outfit: Heart of Stone.
Thou in the Dragon Armor; Thou behind the cold iron. No warmth thaws the heart of stone.

You can also redeem this outfit using Cicada Coins at TREASURE interface in Soul at Stake. Considering the actual value of the Cicada Coins in the game, it should be a reasonable price for this DLC. Cicada Coins are earned by referring friends and let them input your referral code before any of their characters reaches level 5. For those who already owned this outfit, you don't need to purchase the DLC again.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains a chase and slash game mode that uses sharp or blunt weapons, the screen will have a blood splash effect on a successful attack and during the execution event. The setting option "Bloody Mode" is available in the game. Turning off the "Bloody Mode" can remove the blood effects and has a mosaic occlusion when executed.
